#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define in(t) scanf("%d",&t)
#define out(t) printf("%d\n",t);
#define for(i,j,n) for(i=j;i<n;i++)
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,x1,x2,y1,y2,x3,x4,y3,y4,i;
	in(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		in(x1);
		in(y1);
		in(x2);
		in(y2);
		in(x3);
		in(y3);
		in(x4);
		in(y4);
		if(max(x1,x3)<min(x2,x4) && max(y1,y3)<min(y2,y4)) 
		i=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3)-((min(x2,x4)-max(x1,x3))*(min(y2,y4)-max(y1,y3)));
		else 
		i=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
		out(i);
		
	}
	
}
